description_expanded: Febreze Plug Warm Ocean Breeze Scented Oil Refills (2ct) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. Two refill bottles of odor-fighting scented oil for Febreze Plug air fresheners in the Warm Ocean Breeze scent. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
